Wood Carving
Coat of Arms

About

Printed products are great, but some folks want something more refined and elegant. Seize your family’s legacy with our custom wood coats of arms, hand carved by European artisans who have honed their craft for generations. Whether you display in your home, office, restaurant, bar, or pub, the unique, detailed piece will impress friends and family alike, and will serve as a great conversation starter for you to share your family’s story with others.

Oleg Peresvet Spain Craftsman

Craftsman Video

  • Perfect Gift

    These also serve an impressive, thoughtful gifts for special occasions such as weddings and retirements, as well as birthdays, Christmas, and housewarming gift.

  • Any Size

    Carvings can be ordered in almost any size, large or small. All carvings are made of Iroko wood, a strong and reliable material.

  • Piece of Art

    Don’t forget: this is a piece of art that will last for centuries, as it passed down from one generation of the family to the next.

  • Production and shipping

    Production and shipping typically takes between 4-8 weeks, so order now!

Order now!

We will contact you for further details and price calculation
